thread.title: Nice, comfortable rooms and what
thread.title_full: Nice, comfortable rooms and what - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: kariyoung46
title: Nice, comfortable rooms and what
text: Very nice friendly staff. Manager and Beverly were a great help to us. There needs to be a better menu for food. The food is very pricey. Otherwise the rooms are nice the help is nice. Just be careful at the front desk I was charged twice for my room.
